foreignData.name: Hurska Sucre-Gueule
foreignData.text:
À chaque fois que Hurska Sucre-Gueule attaque, créez un jeton Nourriture. (C'est un artefact avec « {2}, {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Vous gagnez 3 points de vie. »)
À chaque fois que vous gagnez des points de vie, vous pouvez payer {G/W}. Quand vous faites ainsi, une créature ciblée gagne +X/+X jusqu'à la fin du tour, X étant le nombre de points de vie que vous avez gagnés.

foreignData.name: Hurska das Schleckermaul
foreignData.text:
Immer wenn Hurska das Schleckermaul angreift, erzeuge einen Speise-Spielstein. (Er ist ein Artefakt mit „{2}, {T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.")
Immer wenn du Lebenspunkte dazuerhältst, kannst du {G/W} bezahlen. Wenn du dies tust, erhält eine Kreatur deiner Wahl bis zum Ende des Zuges +X/+X, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an dazuerhaltenen Lebenspunkten ist.

foreignData.name: Hurska, la Golosa
foreignData.text:
Ogniqualvolta Hurska, la Golosa attacca, crea una pedina Cibo. (È un artefatto con "{2}, {T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Guadagni 3 punti vita".)
Ogniqualvolta guadagni punti vita, puoi pagare {G/W}. Quando lo fai, una creatura bersaglio prende +X/+X fino alla fine del turno, dove X è pari ai punti vita che hai guadagnato.

foreignData.name: 甘党のハースカ
foreignData.text:
甘党のハースカが攻撃するたび、食物・トークン１つを生成する。（それは、「{2}, {T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：あなたは３点のライフを得る。」を持つアーティファクトである。）
あなたがライフを得るたび、{G/W}を支払ってもよい。そうしたとき、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは＋Ｘ/＋Ｘの修整を受ける。Ｘはあなたが得たライフの点数に等しい。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 熊

foreignData.name: Hurska, la golosa
foreignData.text:
Siempre que Hurska, la golosa ataque, crea una ficha de Comida. (Es un artefacto con "{2}, {T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Ganas 3 vidas".)
Siempre que ganes vidas, puedes pagar {G/W}. Cuando lo hagas, la criatura objetivo obtiene +X/+X hasta el final del turno, donde X es la cantidad de vidas que ganaste.

mainBoard.name: Hurska Sweet-Tooth
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever Hurska Sweet-Tooth attacks, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
Whenever you gain life, you may pay {(}g/w)}. When you do, target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained.

rulings.text: The value of X is calculated only once, as the reflexive triggered ability resolves.

You don't choose a target for Hurska's last ability at the time it triggers. Rather, a second "reflexive" ability triggers when you pay {G}{W} this way. You choose a target for that ability as it goes on the stack. Each player may respond to this triggered ability as normal.

rulings.text: Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures, it's never a creature type.

mainBoard.name: Giant Opportunity
mainBoard.originalText: You may sacrifice two Foods. If you do, create a 7/7 green Giant creature token. Otherwise, create three Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

rulings.text: You can't sacrifice more than two Foods to create more than one Giant token.
You choose whether to sacrifice two Foods as Giant Opportunity resolves, not as you cast it.
Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures, it's never a creature type.

If an effect refers to a Food, it means any Food artifact, not just a Food artifact token. For example, you can sacrifice Tough Cookie (an Artifact Creature — Food Golem) to activate Maraleaf Rider's ability (an ability with "Sacrifice a Food" in its cost).
Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.
You can't sacrifice a Food to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate Maraleaf Rider's ability.

mainBoard.text: You may sacrifice two Foods. If you do, create a 7/7 green Giant creature token. Otherwise, create three Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life.")

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Insatiable Appetite tries to resolve, the spell won't resolve. You won't sacrifice a Food.

mainBoard.name: Maraleaf Rider
mainBoard.originalText: Sacrifice a Food: Target creature blocks Maraleaf Rider this turn if able.

rulings.text: If the target creature can block other creatures but can't block Maraleaf Rider, it's free to block any other creature or to not block at all.

If the target creature can't block for any reason (such as being tapped), then it doesn't block. If there's a cost associated with having it block, its controller isn't forced to pay that cost, so it doesn't have to block in that case either.

If an effect refers to a Food, it means any Food artifact, not just a Food artifact token. For example, you can sacrifice Tough Cookie (an Artifact Creature — Food Golem) to activate Maraleaf Rider's ability (an ability with "Sacrifice a Food" in its cost).

mainBoard.name: Orchard Strider
mainBoard.originalText:
When Orchard Strider enters, create two Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

rulings.text: Typecycling is a form of cycling. Any ability that triggers on a card being cycled also triggers on a card being typecycled. Any ability that stops a cycling ability from being activated also stops a typecycling ability from being activated.

Unlike the normal cycling ability, typecycling doesn't allow you to draw a card. Rather, it lets you search your library for a card with the type or types indicated by the ability name. For example, a card with basic landcycling lets you search for a basic land card, and a card with Wizardcycling lets you search for a Wizard card.
Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures, it's never a creature type.
Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.
You can't sacrifice a Food to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate Maraleaf Rider's ability.

(Eine Speise ist ein Artefakt mit „{2}, {T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu." foreignData.name: Approvvigionatrice Instancabile
foreignData.text: Terraferma — Ogniqualvolta una terra che controlli entra, crea una pedina Cibo o una pedina Tesoro. (Il Cibo è un artefatto con "{2}, {T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Guadagni 3 punti vita". Il Tesoro è un artefatto con "{T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore".)

foreignData.name: 不屈の補給兵
foreignData.text: 上陸 — あなたがコントロールしている土地１つが戦場に出るたび、食物・トークン１つか宝物・トークン１つを生成する。（食物は、「{2}, {T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：３点のライフを得る。」を持つアーティファクトである。宝物は、「{T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。」を持つアーティファクトである。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エルフ・スカウト

foreignData.name: Proveedora incansable
foreignData.text: Aterrizaje — Siempre que una tierra que controlas entre, crea una ficha de Comida o una ficha de Tesoro. (La Comida es un artefacto con "{2}, {T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Ganas 3 vidas". El Tesoro es un artefacto con "{T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Agrega un maná de cualquier color".)

mainBoard.name: Tireless Provisioner
mainBoard.originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, create a Food token or a Treasure token. (Food is an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life." Treasure is an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

rulings.text: Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures, it's never a creature type.
Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.
You can't sacrifice a Food to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate Maraleaf Rider's ability.

mainBoard.text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, create a Food token or a Treasure token. (Food is an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life." Treasure is an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

foreignData.text:

{2}{G} : Jusqu'à la fin du tour, un artefact non-créature ciblé que vous contrôlez devient une créature-artefact 4/4.

foreignData.name: Zäher Brocken
foreignData.text:

{2}{G}: Bis zum Ende des Zuges wird ein Nichtkreatur-Artefakt deiner Wahl, das du kontrollierst, zu einer 4/4 Artefaktkreatur.
{2}, {T}, opfere den Zähen Brocken: Du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.name: Tipo Tostato
foreignData.text:
Quando il Tipo Tostato entra, crea una pedina Cibo. (È un artefatto con "{2}, {T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Guadagni 3 punti vita".)
{2}{G}: Fino alla fine del turno, un artefatto non creatura bersaglio che controlli diventa una creatura artefatto 4/4.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifica il Tipo Tostato: Guadagni 3 punti vita.

foreignData.name: 堅いクッキー
foreignData.text:
堅いクッキーが戦場に出たとき、食物・トークン１つを生成する。（それは、「{2}, {T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：３点のライフを得る。」を持つアーティファクトである。）
{2}{G}：あなたがコントロールしていてクリーチャーでないアーティファクト１つを対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは４/４のアーティファクト・クリーチャーになる。

foreignData.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — 食物・ゴーレム

foreignData.name: Repartetortas
foreignData.text:
Cuando el Repartetortas entre, crea una ficha de Comida. (Es un artefacto con "{2}, {T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Ganas 3 vidas".)
{2}{G}: Hasta el final del turno, el artefacto objetivo que no sea criatura que controlas se convierte en una criatura artefacto 4/4.
{2}, {T}, sacrificar el Repartetortas: Ganas 3 vidas.

mainBoard.name: Tough Cookie
mainBoard.originalText:
When Tough Cookie enters, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
{2}{G}: Until end of turn, target noncreature artifact you control becomes a 4/4 artifact creature.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Tough Cookie: You gain 3 life.

rulings.text: As Tough Cookie's second ability resolves, the target permanent keeps any other types and subtypes it had before it became an artifact creature.
Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures, it's never a creature type.
Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.
You can't sacrifice a Food to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate Maraleaf Rider's ability.

mainBoard.text:
When this creature enters, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life.")
{2}{G}: Until end of turn, target noncreature artifact you control becomes a 4/4 artifact creature.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: You gain 3 life.

foreignData.name: Piste de miettes
foreignData.text:
Quand la Piste de miettes arrive, créez un jeton Nourriture. (C'est un artefact avec « {2}, {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Vous gagnez 3 points de vie. »)
À chaque fois que vous sacrifiez une nourriture, vous pouvez payer {1}. Si vous faites ainsi, regardez les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez révéler une carte de permanent parmi elles et la mettre dans votre main. Mettez le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque, dans l'ordre de votre choix.

foreignData.name: Spur aus Brotkrumen
foreignData.text:
Wenn die Spur aus Brotkrumen ins Spiel kommt, erzeuge einen Speise-Spielstein. (Er ist ein Artefakt mit „{2}, {T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.")
Immer wenn du eine Speise opferst, kannst du {1} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, schaue dir die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst davon eine Permanent-Karte offen vorzeigen und auf deine Hand nehmen. Lege den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.name: Sentiero di Briciole
foreignData.text:
Quando il Sentiero di Briciole entra, crea una pedina Cibo. (È un artefatto con "{2}, {T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Guadagni 3 punti vita".)
Ogniqualvolta sacrifichi un Cibo, puoi pagare {1}. Se lo fai, guarda le prime due carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi rivelare una carta permanente scelta tra esse e aggiungerla alla tua mano. Metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine.

foreignData.name: パンくずの道標
foreignData.text:
パンくずの道標が戦場に出たとき、食物・トークン１つを生成する。（それは、「{2}, {T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：３点のライフを得る。」を持つアーティファクトである。）
あなたが食物１つを生け贄に捧げるたび、{1}を支払ってもよい。そうしたなら、あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード２枚を見る。その中からパーマネント・カード１枚を公開し、あなたの手札に加えてもよい。残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に望む順番で置く。

foreignData.name: Rastro de migajas
foreignData.text:
Cuando el Rastro de migajas entre, crea una ficha de Comida. (Es un artefacto con "{2}, {T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Ganas 3 vidas".)
Siempre que sacrifiques una Comida, puedes pagar {1}. Si lo haces, mira las dos primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes mostrar una carta de permanente de entre ellas y ponerla en tu mano. Pon el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden.

mainBoard.name: Trail of Crumbs
mainBoard.originalText:
When Trail of Crumbs enters, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
Whenever you sacrifice a Food, you may pay {1}. If you do, look at the top two cards of your library. You may reveal a permanent card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

rulings.text: A permanent card is an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker card.
While resolving the second triggered ability, you can't pay {1} multiple times to look at more cards.
Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures, it's never a creature type.

If an effect refers to a Food, it means any Food artifact, not just a Food artifact token. For example, you can sacrifice Tough Cookie (an Artifact Creature — Food Golem) to activate Maraleaf Rider's ability (an ability with "Sacrifice a Food" in its cost).
Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.
You can't sacrifice a Food to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate Maraleaf Rider's ability.

mainBoard.text:
When this enchantment enters, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life.")
Whenever you sacrifice a Food, you may pay {1}. If you do, look at the top two cards of your library. You may reveal a permanent card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

mainBoard.flavorText: Sometimes, "as fast as you can" isn't quite fast enough.

foreignData.flavorText: Parfois, « le plus vite possible » n'est pas assez rapide.
foreignData.name: Brute en pain d'épices
foreignData.text:
Célérité (Cette créature peut attaquer et {T} dès le tour où elle arrive sous votre contrôle.)
{1} : La Brute en pain d'épices ne peut pas être bloquée ce tour-ci excepté par des créatures avec la célérité.
{2}, {T}, sacrifiez la Brute en pain d'épices : Vous gagnez 3 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: Manchmal ist, „so schnell du kannst", einfach nicht schnell genug.
foreignData.name: Lebkuchen-Rohling
foreignData.text:
Eile (Diese Kreatur kann angreifen und {T}, sobald sie unter deine Kontrolle kommt.)
{1}: Der Lebkuchen-Rohling kann in diesem Zug außer von Kreaturen mit Eile nicht geblockt werden.
{2}, {T}, opfere den Lebkuchen-Rohling: Du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: A volte "più veloce che puoi" non è sufficiente.
foreignData.name: Bruto di Pan di Zenzero
foreignData.text:
Rapidità (Questa creatura può attaccare e {T} non appena entra sotto il tuo controllo.)
{1}: Il Bruto di Pan di Zenzero non può essere bloccato in questo turno tranne che da creature con rapidità.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifica il Bruto di Pan di Zenzero: Guadagni 3 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 時に、「全速力」が遅すぎることがある。
foreignData.name: ジンジャーブルート
foreignData.text:
速攻（このクリーチャーは、あなたのコントロール下になってすぐに攻撃したり{T}したりできる。）

{2}, {T}, ジンジャーブルートを生け贄に捧げる：３点のライフを得る。
foreignData.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — 食物・ゴーレム

foreignData.flavorText: A veces, "lo más rápido que puedas" no es lo suficientemente rápido.
foreignData.name: Bruto de jengibre
foreignData.text:
Prisa. (Esta criatura puede atacar y {T} tan pronto como entra bajo tu control.)
{1}: El Bruto de jengibre no puede ser bloqueado este turno excepto por criaturas con la habilidad de prisa.
{2}, {T}, sacrificar el Bruto de jengibre: Ganas 3 vidas.

mainBoard.name: Gingerbrute
mainBoard.originalText:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
{1}: Gingerbrute can't be blocked this turn except by creatures with haste.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Gingerbrute: You gain 3 life.

rulings.text: Activating Gingerbrute's middle ability after it has become blocked by a creature without haste won't cause it to become unblocked.
Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures, it's never a creature type.

If an effect refers to a Food, it means any Food artifact, not just a Food artifact token. For example, you can sacrifice Tough Cookie (an Artifact Creature — Food Golem) to activate Maraleaf Rider's ability (an ability with "Sacrifice a Food" in its cost).
Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.
You can't sacrifice a Food to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate Maraleaf Rider's ability.

mainBoard.text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
{1}: This creature can't be blocked this turn except by creatures with haste.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: You gain 3 life.

mainBoard.flavorText: Far from human eyes, birds flit between vivid blossoms in a hidden paradise.

foreignData.flavorText: À l'abri des regards humains, les oiseaux papillonnent entre les fleurs luxuriantes d'un paradis caché.
foreignData.name: Bosquet prospère
foreignData.text:
Le Bosquet prospère arrive engagé. Au moment où il arrive, choisissez une couleur autre que le vert.
{T} : Ajoutez {G} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: Menschlichen Blicken entzogen, schwirren Vögel in einem verborgenen Paradies zwischen farbenfrohen Blüten umher.
foreignData.name: Gedeihender Hain
foreignData.text:
Der Gedeihende Hain kommt getappt ins Spiel. Sowie er ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Grün.
{T}: Erzeuge {G} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Al riparo da occhi umani, gli uccellini guizzano tra boccioli dai colori vivaci in un paradiso nascosto.
foreignData.name: Boschetto Florido
foreignData.text:
Il Boschetto Florido entra TAPpato. Mentre entra, scegli un colore diverso dal verde.
{T}: Aggiungi {G} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 人の目に触れないこの知られざる楽園で、鳥たちは鮮やかな花々の間を飛び交っている。
foreignData.name: 興隆する木立
foreignData.text:
興隆する木立はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、緑でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{G}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: Lejos de la mirada de los humanos, los pájaros revolotean entre flores en un paraíso oculto.
foreignData.name: Arboleda floreciente
foreignData.text:
La Arboleda floreciente entra girada. En cuanto entre, elige un color que no sea verde.
{T}: Agrega {G} o un maná del color elegido.

mainBoard.name: Thriving Grove
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Grove enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than green.
{T}: Add {G} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than green.
